oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-07-17 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-07-17 part 1. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring the Valentines, the Moonglows, and the Drifters. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sam "The Man" Taylor; Drifters; Moonglows
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement (Alan Freed) -- Opening statement (Bern Bennett) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Look Out (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces the Drifters -- Ruby Baby (Drifters) -- Alan Freed introduces the Drifters -- Your Promise To Be Mine (Dirfters) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces the Moonglows -- We Go Together (Moonglows)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Drifters (Musical group); Moonglows (Musical group); Valentines (Musical group); Sears, Al, 1910-1990; Henry, Haywood; Melamed, Louis
